blogposts.title: Masala Cheese French Toast
blogposts.author: fardeen baig
blogposts.blog: Saucy bread and cheese sandwiches dipped in a herby egg white batter and pan fried. A quick and healthy option for your breakfast on-the-go or a mid night snack.

blogposts.title: Chilli Gobhi
blogposts.author: deepthi
blogposts.blog: Spice is nice. Cauliflower florets cooked with an oriental tang. A quick serving for those unannounced guests! This delightful vegetarian recipe will help keep you hunger pangs away. It has a mix of spices that will ensure your palates are satisfied.

blogposts.title: Yogurt Crunch Pudding
blogposts.author: bhargav
blogposts.blog: A breezy pudding to complete a lazy Sunday afternoon well spent. Impress all with this fuss free fruity dessert. What's better than having a crunchy and healthy dessert after a good meal? Nothing, we assure, as this recipe is bound to make you fall in love.

blogposts.title: Matar ke Kebab
blogposts.author: fardeen baig
blogposts.blog: A speedy appetizer for those for last minute dinner dates! Kebabs made with spinach and peas. Minimal oil is used to pan fry these green beauties.

blogposts.title: Chilli Paneer Dry Recipe
blogposts.author: fardeen baig
blogposts.blog: Chilli paneer is is a popular restaurant style Indo-Chinese starter that is great for dinner parties with friends and family. A spicy, tangy paneer recipe that is made from paneer, cornflour, black pepper, maida, onion, green capsicum, et al and cooked to perfection.
